page.title: 06THE LOCAL LIBRARY
page.content:
{A Visit to the Local Library
We went to Cleckheaton Library and interviewed a librarian called Miss Roberts.She works about 37 hours a week,from 9 o clock in a morning sometimes till 7 o clock at night, Monday to Friday,and looks after the reference library and local history.While we were there we saw a map about 270 years old.We also found out that the Cleckheaton Advertiser was last printed about 50 years ago.We looked at original papers as well as microfilm records.We saw a Spenborough Guardian from the year 1967 and a newspaper about 100 years old in which the writing was sqashed up.The Spenborough Guardian started in 1867 and cost 1d.We also found out that there used to be a station where Hillards supermarket is now.
